comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: "Parade" here is meant more like "plaza" than normal usage. Here is an article on the Grand Parade, with recent photographs.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: They let the cars in by the time of this postcard www.etsy.com/listing/79467853/vintage-ireland-postcard-gr... Pictures (apparently from June 2010) at kieranmccarthy.ie/wordpress/?p=3318 suggest that the space is now divided, with traffic on one side and public pedestrian space on the other. Google StreetView agrees.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: The Berwick Fountain, seen in the middle distance in the Bain photo, is described here: www.corkpastandpresent.ie/places/grandparade/berwickfount...
